oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Shindig In The Country (version 2) (16562)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: festivals; Music festivals; Wiseman, Mac; Walker, Charlie, 1926-2008; Tubb, Ernest, 1914-1984; Cooper, Stoney, 1918-1977; Cooper, Wilma Lee, 1921-2011; Lonzo and Oscar; Martin, Jimmy; Harrell, Bill; Louvin, Charlie, 1927-2011;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color half sheet (red and black on white) announcing a Shindig in the Country with Mac Wiseman, Charlie Walker, Ernest Tubb, Wilma Lee and Stoney Cooper, Lonzo and Oscar, Jimmy Martin, the Sunny Mountain Boys, Don Reno, Bill Harrell, Tennessee Cutups, Charlie Louvin, Leon Morris, Peggy Sue and Sonny Wright and others at Aunt Minnie's Farm and Country Roads Park on July 4-6. Poster features metal photoplates of Mac Wiseman, Charlie Walker, Ernest Tubb, Wilma Lee and Stoney Cooper, Lonzo and Oscar, Jimmy Martin, Don Reno, Bill Harrell, and Charlie Louvin. Poster was ordered by Dave Austin (purchase order 16562). For additional information about this poster see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/32014.
